about_the_game:
The evil and corrupt magic has invaded the entire kingdom continent, causing all residents to mutate into terrifying madness. Players need to control a furry warrior with a sacred mission, building unique cards and equipment for the brave hero in each unique adventure. In the game, players can obtain and equip powerful props and build cards for heroes of different professions to defeat stronger enemies and uncover the mysterious and corrupt truth behind them!

Endless Adventure: Before embarking on each round robin journey, draw handy combinations from unlocked characters, professions, and cards! Every adventure is vastly different from the previous journey!

Defeat the Corrupt Monster blocking the way: Players can defeat the corrupt monsters blocking the way, collect powerful loot along the way, and unlock new cards.

Save the Corrupt Magical World: Players must defeat one corrupt guard leader after another in a grand adventure epic, save the world from fire and water, and ultimately find the real culprit behind it!
